mapper.insert: insert into teacher_info (username, password, sex, name, title, avatar, role) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{name}, #{title}, #{avatar}, #{role})
mapper.update: update teacher_info set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, sex = #{sex}, name = #{name}, title = #{title}, avatar = #{avatar}, role=#{role} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from teacher_info
and username like concat ('%',#{username},'%')
order by id desc
